title: Creativity City.iso
description:
What can I say? This ISO contains the installation disc for VeggieTales Creativity City. The game came out in 2003, moreso the first half of it.

For fonts commonly seen in past VeggieTales releases, go to the "Fonts" folder in the program's folder after you install. Please use them only for personal stuff.

Also, it doesn't require the disk to run! YAY!

Requires 64 Mb RAM, 60 MB Hard Disk Space, Windows 98 or higher

     ----------Description----------

There's So Much To Do in Creativity City!
Visit Larry's Sign Shack, the Post Office and even Junior's Toy Box to create and print your own pictures, games and hilarious activities.


Art's Gallery - See your work you've made

VeggiePlex - Posters

Sign Shack (L. Cucumber Proprietor): Think Banners, Awards, Doorknob Hangers, Growth Charts, Etc.!

Post Office - Stuff you can Mail to friends, family and so on

Junior's Toy Box - Stuff for you to play, including nifty Connect-the-Dots and Maze Makers

Bob's Bookworks - Reading/Writing Material. Includes an E-Book maker which makes a file out of a book you can send to another friend who has the game and have them use the included E-Book reader to view (Icon: Larry, program also in program folder if shortcut deleted). Complicated, I know, but it's fun!
